original: Koch, Carl Arvid Henning M :son, direktör, Uddevalla, f. 7/8/74 i By, Värml. 1., av godsäg. Michael K. l/. Adelaide Lindman. G. 99 m. Méry Almberg. Barn: Marianne f. 00, Enar 04, Gösta 06, Sven 10. — Stud. v. Vänersborgs h. a. 1. o. v. Hand :inst. i Gbg. Tj :man i Munkedals A-B 92-98, Kampenhofs A-B i Uddevalla 98-17, egen verksamh. i Uddevalla ’sed. 17. Fd. brandchef, rev. v. System A-B i Uddevalla sed. 07 m. fl. rev:uppdr. f. Uddevalla stad, fd. led. av styr. f. ett flert. bok, landst :omr :befälh. 12-28, hemv:kretsbefälh. 40-42, fd. ordf. i Bo-husl. landst :förb. verkst. utsk., fd. v. ordf. i Bohusl. landst :förb., led. av styr. f. Gbgs o. Boh. 1. skytteförb. sed. 03. RVO 31, Landst :GM, 4 GM, SM m. fl.
translated: Koch, Carl Arvid Henning M: son, director, Uddevalla, born on 7th August 1874 in By, Värmland. Son of estate owner Michael K. and Adelaide Lindman. Married in 1899 to Méry Almberg. Children: Marianne, born in 1900; Enar, born in 1904; Gösta, born in 1906; Sven, born in 1910. Studied at Vänersborg's higher education institute. and at the vocational school of the Handicraft Institute in Gothenburg. Worked as an employee at Munkedals A-B from 1892 to 1898, and at Kampenhofs A-B in Uddevalla from 1898 to 1917. Started own business in Uddevalla in 1917. Former fire chief, auditor for System A-B in Uddevalla since 1907 and other auditing assignments for Uddevalla municipality. Former member of the board for several book and county military command areas from 1912 to 1928, and local district military command from 1940 to 1942. Former chairman of the board for the Bohus county council executive committee, deputy chairman of the Bohus county council, and member of the board for Gothenburg and Bohus county shooting association since 1903. Awarded with the Royal Order of Vasa in 1931, Landsting Gold Medal, 4 Gold Medals, Silver Medal, among others.

memberOf.name: Gothenburg and Bohus County Shooting Association
